comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050506-1600

When you press F1 in the help view you get a widget is disposed error.

1. Press F1 from a java editor
2. Click in the help view
3. Press F1

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed

I can't reproduce this on my work machine with M7, but will have a go on my home
PC.  It could have something to do with the show help view in options.
